name: The Cradle of Ruin/毁灭的摇篮/ほろびのゆりかご
name_original: The Cradle of Ruin/毁灭的摇篮/ほろびのゆりかご
description:
Hotarou lives in a white shelter together with four females. They never doubt the happiness in their daily life, but it suddenly comes to the end one day.
The first but the most difficult choice lies in front of him, he have to do something to escape from the circling and repeating tragedy before the whole world is destroyed.
【Characters】
【Megi】
Hotarou's mother, taking care of everyone in the white shelter.
【Mikuri】
A girl of few words, living together with others in the white shelter.
【Tsuna】
Same age as Hotarou, not only looks but thinks like a child.
【Angelica】
Having good relationship with Megi, generous, sober and matured.
【Hotarou】
Leading character of the game.
「The Ultimate Choice is waiting for YOU to make.」
【Introduction】
Type of the game：Future-Selecting Suspense ADV
Estimated game length：180 minutes
Numbers of ending：TRUE END×1　BAD END×6
（Route A：4 Endings; Route B: 2 Endings; Route C: 2 Endings）
（Please be sure to find the way to the True End to uncover the riddle of the world. ）
Authoring Tools：RPG Maker MV
